question:
The land was divided into which of the following categories during the time of Akbar?
1. Polaj 
2. Parati
3. Chachar 
4. Banjar
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
During the time of Akbar the land was divided into four categories –
Polaj was cultivated every year
Parati was fallow, once in two years
Chachar was cultivated once in three or four years
Banjar land was cultivated once in five or more years
